    • threadNick

      Thread threadNick
      Thread responsible for the login screen

    • threadChoice

      Thread threadChoice
      Thread responsible for the lobby screen:
      • choose whether to join an existing game or create a new one.
      • insert the parameters and create a game, or select a game within the list of avaiable ones.

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewCLI

      public ViewCLI(boolean isRMI, String serverAddress)
      Create a new ViewCLI, instantiating the client and connecting to the server.
      Parameters:
      isRMI - True if the connection type is RMI, false if it is Socket
      serverAddress - Address of the server

  • Method Details

    • isInLobbyList

      private boolean isInLobbyList(String gameName)
      Check if the game name is in the list of available ones

    • validateString

      private boolean validateString(String input)
      Parameters:
      input - String to be validated
      Returns:
      True if the string is valid, false otherwise

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Create the ViewCLI and start it.
      Parameters:
      args - Contains information about the connection type and the server address.

    • update

      public void update(GameView msg, GameEvent ev)
      Main method in the View interface, used to update the view with the new model. After checking the game is still ongoing, it prints all the items of the view using information in the updated model.
      Specified by:
      update in interface View
      Parameters:
      msg - The GameView that represents the immutable version of the updated model
      ev - Event that caused the model's change

    • run

      public void run()
      Main execution method, overrides the one in Runnable.
      • Starts the thread that asks the user for the nickname (login phase)
      • Start the thread that allows the user to join or create a new game
      • Start the thread that handles the user input for the entire game
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Specified by:
      run in interface View

    • endLoginPhase

      public void endLoginPhase()
      Method called by UserInputListener when the NicknameMessage receives a positive response from the Server. This allows the transition to the choiceThread.
      Specified by:
      endLoginPhase in interface View

    • endLobbyPhase

      public void endLobbyPhase()
      Method called by UserInputListener when the create or join message receive a positive response from the Server. This allows the transition to the execution of the main game..
      Specified by:
      endLobbyPhase in interface View

    • parseInput

      public void parseInput(String s)
      Method used to parse the input string and call the correct method to handle the chosen command.
      Parameters:
      s - The input string

    • selectTile

      private boolean selectTile(int r, int c)
      Method that handles the selection of a tile in the board, after checking that the single tile is actually selectable as well as all the group of tiles selected so far.
      Parameters:
      r - The row of the tile
      c - The column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the tile has been selected, false otherwise

    • deselectTile

      private boolean deselectTile(int r, int c)
      Method that allows to deselect a tile from the h
      Parameters:
      r - The row of the tile to deselect
      c - The column of the tile to deselect
      Returns:
      true if the tile has been deselected, false otherwise

    • isTileExisting

      private boolean isTileExisting(int r, int c)
      Checks if a tile exists in the board
      Parameters:
      r - The row of the tile
      c - The column of the tile
      Returns:
      true if the tile exists, false otherwise

    • confirmSelection

      private void confirmSelection()
      Calls the EventManager.notify(E, java.lang.Object...) method to send the selected tiles to the server.

    • selectColumn

      private boolean selectColumn(int c)
      Checks the validity of the selected column and if correct calls the notify method to send the selected column to the server.
      Parameters:
      c - Column index
      Returns:
      true if the column is valid (and this information sent to the server), false otherwise

    • pickTileFromHand

      private boolean pickTileFromHand(int index)
      Allows to pick a tile from the hand to be inserted in the bookshelf. If the index is not valid, an error is printed, otherwise the index is saved and sent to the server, by calling the notify.
      Parameters:
      index -
      Returns:

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Returns:
      The nickname of the player associated to this CLI

    • isTilesGroupSelectable

      public boolean isTilesGroupSelectable(List<LocatedTile> chosen)
      Utility method used to check wheter a group of tiles is sleectable or not.
      Parameters:
      chosen - The list of tiles to check. Note that LocatedTiles are used since they contain the position of the tile in the board.
      Returns:
      true if the group of tiles is selectable, false otherwise

    • nicknameAlreadyUsed

      public void nicknameAlreadyUsed()
      Print an error message if the nickname provided by the during login phase is already used by another player. This is used in UserInputListener after the server has responded to the login request.
      Specified by:
      nicknameAlreadyUsed in interface View

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      Allows to set the nickname of the player associated to this CLI. This is used in UserInputListener if the server response to the login request is positive.
      Specified by:
      setNickname in interface View
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player

    • setAvailableGames

      public void setAvailableGames(List<GameController.GameDefinition> availableGames)
      Set the list of available games to show in the lobby. This is used in UserInputListener to save the list of available games received from the server.
      Specified by:
      setAvailableGames in interface View
      Parameters:
      availableGames - The list of available games

    • setReconnecting

      public void setReconnecting(boolean reconnecting)
      Set the reconnecting status of the player corresponding to this CLI. This is used in UserInputListener after the server has responded to the login request.
      Specified by:
      setReconnecting in interface View
      Parameters:
      reconnecting - true if the player is reconnecting, false otherwise

    • getGameName

      public String getGameName()
      Description copied from interface: View
      Returns the name of the game the user is in
      Specified by:
      getGameName in interface View
      Returns:
      The name of the game

    • getGameView

      public GameView getGameView()
      Specified by:
      getGameView in interface View
      Returns:
      The last GameView received from the server.
